channel.title: post-tensioned on Sandberg GPR
channel.description: Recent content in post-tensioned on Sandberg GPR

item.title: GPR bridge investigation
item.description: On bridges GPR can be used to map reinforcement, locate post-tensioned tendons, determine general construction detail, thickness of construction and much more…

item.title: Warehouse tendon location survey with on-site mark-up
item.description: GPR case study: How we used GPR tendon location survey methods for floor slab tendon location with in situ mark-up in a working warehouse.

item.title: Why you must locate reinforcing steel in concrete before you drill
item.description: “Locate concrete reinforcing steel before you find it with your drill bit, core barrel or saw! Work safe and avoid dangerous and costly hits”.

item.title: Concrete Scanning
item.description: Concrete scanning covers a range of techniques to establish detail within concrete including rebar location, mapping and imaging, thickness and tendons.

item.title: Concrete inspection â€“ locating hazards and defects in concrete
item.description: GPR concrete inspection enables you to see into the sub-surface to determine construction detail, locate dangers, and identify defects in concrete.
